name: Cartonfall
description: It was another night shift at your job in a warehouse, when a madman with a box on his head, took control over the complex. Now you are under his control, to get out of here you have to solve his wicked riddles and smash through his weird cardboard structures by using anything you find in the boxes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5 2500K/AMD FX 6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660/Radeon R7 265 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 4400/AMD FX 8300 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 360 Storage: 1500 MB available space
